title: About me
text: I am a second-year PhD student in Public Governance, Management and Policy at University of Bologna under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Pietro Biroli (University of Bologna). My research lies in applied microeconomics and economics of education. If you want to get in touch, please don’t hesitate to contact me.

title: Elisa Baldazzi
text: I am a second-year PhD student in Public Governance, Management and Policy at University of Bologna under the supervision of Prof. Dr. Pietro Biroli (University of Bologna) and Prof. Dr. Marina Della Giusta (University of Turin). My research lies in applied microeconomics and economics of education. If you want to get in touch, please don’t hesitate to contact me.
